data.text: @me_and_flora @debbiei13 @fact_covid @SkyNews Well said. Many are already on edge.

@fact_covid @SkyNews They are desperately trying to cause as much fear as possible. I keep receiving various news alerts trying to tempt me in- never had them before 🤷🏻‍♀️.
I’m thinking maybe, just maybe, people aren’t taking as much notice of the MSM as they’d like. I’m not interested in any fear porn

@fact_covid @SkyNews I've suffered terribly from anxiety this past week. I've dramatically cut down the amount of news and general social media i've watched/read the past few days. Still have anxiety but it has eased.
@fact_covid @SkyNews Sky news will be gutted if this doesn’t escalate to WW3- makes me sick how they fear monger with no thought how this affects the anxious.
@KarliLay @fact_covid @SkyNews Don’t think bbc news is the best to watch they scaremonger I watch Al Jazeera news it’s very informative.
@cmodyssey @fact_covid @SkyNews This is a good start https://t.co/ksWYg2ywlZ
@shambolic1966 @KarliLay @JonJonBelloo @fact_covid @SkyNews This will give a better understanding https://t.co/SHo55cBG1i
@JonJonBelloo @KarliLay @fact_covid @SkyNews But if you're just outside the blast radius it would be a lot worse. That's what I'm most anxious about.

@KarliLay @JonJonBelloo @fact_covid @SkyNews There is zero chance of nuclear war. There is no 'red button' - the order would have to filter through so many people and they wouldn't do it.
War is terrible but this conflict is far from us and will never reach our shores. Trust me on that.
